Package algonquin.cst2335.finalandroidgroupproject.data

Class FlightTrackerViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
algonquin.cst2335.finalandroidgroupproject.data.FlightTrackerViewModel
public class FlightTrackerViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel class for managing and storing flight-related data for the Flight Tracker app. This class provides LiveData observables that can be observed by UI components to respond to data changes.

  • Field Details

    • flights

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<ArrayList<Flight>> flights
      LiveData object holding a list of flights. Any changes to this list will be observed by the subscribed UI components.

    • selectedFlight

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<Flight> selectedFlight
      LiveData object representing a selected flight. UI components can observe this to respond to any change in the selected flight.

    • selectedFragmentType

      public final androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<Integer> selectedFragmentType
      LiveData object representing the type of fragment currently selected (e.g., Details or Delete). UI components can observe this to adjust the display based on the selected fragment type.

    • isFragmentViewDestroyed

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<Boolean> isFragmentViewDestroyed
      LiveData indicating if the fragment's view was destroyed. true when the view is destroyed, otherwise false.
